# NIPS Education Solutions

> Professional training institute based in Lahore, Pakistan offering career-focused courses in AI, English language, and creative skills.

## About NIPS

NIPS Education Solutions SMC Pvt Ltd is a leading educational institute in Lahore, Pakistan. We specialize in practical, industry-focused training programs with small batch sizes (max 15 students) for personalized attention.

**Location**: K Block, Johar Town, Lahore, Pakistan
**Contact**: +92 321 5554125
**Email**: info@nips.com.pk
**Website**: https://nips.com.pk

## Courses Offered

### 1. Applied AI for Business (12 Weeks)
Practical AI training covering ChatGPT, automation tools, and business applications. Learn to leverage AI for productivity and decision-making.

### 2. IELTS Preparation (8 Weeks)
Comprehensive IELTS preparation covering all four modules: Reading, Writing, Listening, and Speaking. Personalized feedback and mock tests included.

### 3. Spoken English (6 Weeks)
Fluency-focused English speaking course with confidence building, pronunciation training, and daily conversation practice.

### 4. AI Graphics Design (10 Weeks)
Create stunning visuals using AI tools like Midjourney, DALL-E, and Canva AI. No prior design experience needed.

### 5. Calligraphy (8 Weeks)
Traditional and modern calligraphy including Nastaliq, Arabic scripts, and English lettering. Materials included.

### 6. Prompt Engineering Masterclass (6 Weeks)
Master the art of communicating with AI systems. Learn advanced prompting techniques for ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and more.

### 7. Cloud Computing Essentials (10 Weeks)
Master AWS, Azure, and cloud infrastructure. Covers EC2, S3, Docker, serverless, and DevOps basics.

## Key Features

- Small batch sizes (maximum 15 students)
- Industry-experienced instructors
- Both online and in-person options
- Practical, project-based learning
- Certificate upon completion
- Located in Johar Town, Lahore

## Enrollment

To enroll in any course, visit https://nips.com.pk/contact.html or contact us via WhatsApp at +92 321 5554125.
